boardgame.description: In Friday the 13th, also available over the years as Poison and Baker's Dozen, players try to avoid bad luck by not taking cards from the central playing area each round. The more you take, the worse your score _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash; unless you manage to take the most of one suit, in which case you get to throw those cards away!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In a round, each player gets a hand of cards, with the cards coming in three suits that have values from 1 to 7 and a fourth _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;joker_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; suit in which all the cards have a value of 4. On a turn, a player discards a card from her hand onto a pile of the appropriate color (with jokers being playable on any pile) and gives the sum of all cards now in that pile. If the sum is higher than 13, then the player must first take all of the cards already in the pile, leaving only her card behind._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The round ends once all the cards have been played, then players compare how many cards they have in each of the three suits; whoever has the most cards throws them away, while everyone else scores 1 penalty point per card. Each joker is worth 2 penalty points. Whoever has the fewest penalty points after each player has started a round once wins!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Playroom Entertainment* Playroom Entertainment (PLE 14100) $13.99 [Poison] If you are interested in Baker_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Dozen contact us. Playroom Entertainment (PLE 14200) $8.99 [Baker_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Dozen] ** The mad doctor has cooked up something evil in Reiner Knizia_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Poison, a clever strategy card game. Players choose a potion card from their hand to add to one of three colored cauldrons, being careful not to let the pot go over a total value of 13. The player who causes the cauldron to go over 13 must take all of the cards within it, trying to avoid taking a potion mixed with poison. Be the player with either the most or none of any potion and you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;re safe - otherwise take the risk of receiving a deadly dose! For 3 to 6 Players Ages 10 to Adult 15 Minute Playing Time Contents: 42 Potion Cards, 8 Poison Cards, 3 Cauldron Boards and Instructions in English, Spanish _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; French

Condition: Mint Condition. Played once. Cards sleeved prior to playing, sleeves included. All components included. PayPal payments must include tracking with their shipping method. Shipping cost will be calculated once items have been purchased and packaged. Contact Me: You can geekmail me or e-mail me at dornishman (AT) gmail (DOT) com if you have any questions.
